events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and keywords in your resume mentioning software development and engineering.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will be guiding you through the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening call went well, discussing your software engineering background, relevant projects, and matching role expectations.
You replied promptly to our initial screening follow-up, expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview and readiness to proceed with further evaluations.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC, focusing on development skills, problem solving, and system design.
The technical interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on your coding skills, algorithms knowledge, and system architecture understanding.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss your work preferences, culture fit, and benefits.
Your HR interview concluded with positive remarks regarding your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role including competitive salary, benefits, and flexible work options.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer details and expressed your eagerness to join our engineering team.
You officially accepted the offer to join us as a Software Engineer, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard.
The onboarding process has started with account setups, orientation schedules, and introduction to the engineering team.
The hiring process is officially closed with you joining as a full-time software engineer. Welcome aboard!
